title: 110: Deep Dive Into Gut Health with Charity Lighten, Founder of Silver Fern

description:
Our gut is the foundation of our health and after my fiancé got Bali Belly and I got Montezuma’s revenge in Mexico, both of us have become probiotic HOUNDS, which led me to discover Silver Fern, an incredible company with extremely high potency probiotics. I was lucky enough to interview the founder on all your digestive questions.

In this episode, we discuss:
-How the digestive system works
-The importance of gut bacteria
-How to heal Candida, leaky gut, SIBO, Crohns
-How to spot a good probiotic
-Do probiotics need to be refrigerated to be effective? (Answer will surprise you!)
